1.0.2.name: wordpress/last-plugin-updates
1.0.2.description: This plugin adds a widget to the dashboard, listing the installed plugins and the date of their last update. The date is fetched from the WordPress.org plugins repository. Thus it is the date when the plugin was last updated on by the author, not the date of the last update in the Wordpress installation. This list can be displayed in ascending and descending order of name and date of the last update.
